chunk_responses.content:
<0> <2> A group of people are sitting on a couch, watching someone play a game.
<2> <4> A woman in a white coat clasps her hands together nervously.
<4> <6> A man in a green sweater watches intently as another man prepares to throw a ball.
<6> <8> A man in a light green shirt picks up an orange ping pong ball.
<8> <12> The man throws the orange ping pong ball towards a camera bag on the floor.
<12> <14> The ball bounces off the floor and into the camera bag.
<14> <16> A man in a striped shirt looks on with a shocked expression.
<16> <18> The group celebrates the successful throw.
<18> <20> An animated outro screen shows a dog and a television.

<20> <22> An intro screen for an SBS entertainment show is displayed.
<22> <24> A title card reads "왕진 가방 빙고" (Doctor's Bag Bingo).
<24> <28> The game's objective is shown: "Bounce a ping pong ball on the floor to make a bingo."
<28> <31> The text explains the first stage: "Make one line of bingo with 5 ping pong balls."
<31> <35> The cast members are sitting and getting ready for the game, which is their first attempt out of ten chances.
<35> <38> A player takes a ping pong ball and aims for the center of the bag.
